tr.td: Capital won the toss, elects to defer.

Luke Creditt pass complete to Tim Murphy for 4 yards to the WILM37 (Jon Eaton).
Gino Hinton rush for 3 yards to the WILM40 (Drew Selegue; Tyler Conner).
